abstract.p: Owner of Salem Packing Co in Salem County, NJ, is indicted for third time in 14 years for violating state environmental regulations by dumping blood, byproducts and animal waste and contamination on neighboring properties and into nearby rivers and streams (S)

block.p: The owner of a slaughterhouse in Salem County has been charged for the third time in 14 years for environmental violations.

In the indictment issued last week, the state attorney general charged that the slaughterhouse, the Salem Packing Company, turned neighboring properties into rivers of blood, byproducts and animal waste and contaminated nearby rivers and streams.
